Paragraph: However , it seems that some larger phase aggregation occurs in PzNDTDTBT / PC71BM blend , which has a negative effect on the PSCs and corresponds to the slight photovoltaic performance degradation of PzNDTDTBT.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PzNDTDTBT |
| PC71BM |

In the given paragraph, the two "Material Name" entities are "PzNDTDTBT" and "PC71BM". These are materials mentioned in the context of a blend used in organic photovoltaic cells (PSCs).

In this paragraph, the only clear "Material Name" entities are "PzNDTDTBT" and "PC71BM". The term "PSCs" (organic photovoltaic cells) is not a material name, but rather a type of device. Therefore, it has not been included in the table.
